c74object.name: abc.peakamp~
c74object.description: abc.peakamp~ computes the highest absolute value of the incoming signal on a duration defined by period attribute in milliseconds.

attribute.name: period
attribute.description: sets the temporal window in which the peak amplitude is computed in ms. [init=10:min=1:max=5000:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the temporal window in which the peak amplitude is computed in ms.

method.name: period
method.description: sets the temporal window in which the peak amplitude is computed in ms. [init=10:min=1:max=5000:step=1].
method.digest: sets the temporal window in which the peak amplitude is computed in ms.
